definitions.definition: A resinous substance, dry and brittle, obtained from Styrax benzoin , a tree of Sumatra, Java, etc., having a fragrant odor, and slightly aromatic taste. It is used in the preparation of benzoic acid , in medicine, and as a perfume.
An aromatic hydroxy ketone , 2-hydroxy-1,2-di(phenyl)ethanone , synthesized from benzaldehyde ; any derivative of this compound.

main_definition: A resinous substance, dry and brittle, obtained from Styrax benzoin , a tree of Sumatra, Java, etc., having a fragrant odor, and slightly aromatic taste. It is used in the preparation of benzoic acid , in medicine, and as a perfume. [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry ) An aromatic hydroxy ketone , 2-hydroxy-1,2-di(phenyl)ethanone , synthesized from benzaldehyde ; any derivative of this compound. [from 19th c.]
